font-family: Specifies the font family for text.
font-size: Specifies the size of the font.
font-weight: Specifies the weight of a font.
background-color: Sets the background color of an element.
display: Specifies how an element is displayed on the page.
position: Specifies the positioning method for an element.
float: Specifies how an element should float.
width: Sets the width of an element.
margin: Sets the margin area on all four sides of an element.
padding: Sets the padding area on all four sides of an element.
border: A shorthand property for border-width, border-style and border-color.
border-radius: Defines the radius of the element's corners.
background-image: Sets one or more background images for an element.
